title: Akali has a 42.74% winrate with an almost 70% banrate in PLAT+

embed.description: LoL Statistics, Guides, Builds, Runes, Masteries, Skill Orders, Counters and Matchups for Akali when played Middle. Statistics include Akali's Win Rate, Play Rate and Ban Rate. Counters include who Akali Middle is Strong or Weak Against.

body:
Her winrate is in the low 40s in all elos so it clearly isn't a skill issue. Its been about 4 months since her rework, shes always had a sub-50% winrate yet is still getting battered with nerfs

She isn't is a proplay issue like Azir, Ryze or Kalista as her winrate and impact there is subpar too. All these people saying winrate doesn't matter do have some merit in their argument but when it's this bad, it kind of becomes void. Is there any valid argument on why Akali is even getting more nerfs when she is already a trash champ.
Edit: For those saying she is good when mastered, the winrate is still in the low 40s in PLAT+. It's been months since she was reworked as I said and she isnt so hard as to have kept this winrate for the longest time. Sure she is annoying but if you know how to adapt to the matchup, you cool. You just gotta understand she isn't a champion without her shroud and if it keeps getting nerfed true stealth won't matter anymore.
